definitions: in a way that relates to moral principles

examples.text: to be spiritual may be interpreted both ethically and religiously
numerous companies with ethically questionable practices

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to moral principles

definitions: in a morally good or correct manner

examples.text: we will act ethically in our relations with the public

shortDefinitions: in morally good or correct manner

definitions: in a way that avoids activities or organizations that do harm to people or the environment

examples.text: she was keen to see her money invested ethically

shortDefinitions: in way that avoids activities or organizations that do harm to people
